headline: S&P Global Schedules Second Quarter 2025 Earnings Announcement and Conference Call for Thursday, July 31, 2025
summary: S&P Global's (NYSE: SPGI) second quarter 2025 results will be issued on Thursday, July 31, 2025 via news release at approximately 7:15 a.m. Eastern Daylight Time. The news release will be available at www.spglobal.com.

headline: Here's Why You Should Retain SPGI Stock in Your Portfolio Now
summary: SPGI posts solid Q1 growth across all divisions, bolstered by acquisitions and a strong recurring revenue model despite liquidity pressure.

headline: S&P Global Publishes Findings on the Future of Capital Markets
summary: S&P Global (NYSE: SPGI) today released Look Forward: Future of Capital Markets, a new research report that explores private capital, tokenization, and agentic AI as the notable trends adapting financial markets to the complexities of modern capital needs.

headline: Record 72.2 Million Americans Expected to Travel Domestically July 4th Week
summary: WASHINGTON, DC - AAA projects 72.2 million people will travel at least 50 miles or more from home over the Independence Day holiday period from Saturday, June 28 to Sunday, July 6. This year's...
